DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety LBH589B adult patient multiple myeloma receive least two prior therapy refractory last therapy . Patients must receive prior therapy either bortezomib lenalidomide
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety LBH589B Adult Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Adults ≥ 18 year old 2 . Diagnosis symptomatic multiple myeloma ( per IMWG see Kyle et al 2003 ) 3 . Subjects must receive least two prior line therapy refractory recent line therapy 4 . Subjects must previously treat : bortezomib lenalidomide 5 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status ( PS ) ≤ 2 6 . Patients must adequate laboratory value 7 . Baseline leave ventricular ejection fraction LVEF ≥ low limit institutional normal Exclusion criterion : 1 . Prior therapy histone deacetylase inhibitor ( HDAC ) 2 . Impaired cardiac function clinically significant cardiac diseases 3 . Impairment gastrointestinal function ( GI ) function GI disease may significantly alter absorption LBH589 4 . Patients unresolved diarrhea > Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events ( CTCAE ) grade 1 5 . Concomitant use certain medication 6 . Patients receive chemotherapy , radiation therapy investigational drug , bortezomib immunomodulatory therapy immunotherapy ≤ 3 week prior start study drug recover side effect therapy 7 . Patients receive steroid ≤ 2 week prior start study treatment recover side effect therapy . 8 . Patients receive highdose corticosteroid component recent line therapy 9 . Patients undergone major surgery ≤ 4 week prior start study drug recover side effect therapy 10 . Women pregnant breast feed woman childbearing potential use effective method birth control . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
